Filipino(fil): Araling nating dumaan sa intersection nang maayos. Ang max speed sa intersection ay 20kph. Ngayon, subukan nating lumiko pa-KANAN sa susunod na intersection.
English(en): Let's learn how to use the intersection correctly. Note that the max speed in intersections is 20kph. First, Try turning RIGHT on the next intersection.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na kapag liliko pa-kanan sa intersection, ilagay ang sarili sa KANANG lane. Sa susunod na pagsasanay, bumalik sa intersection at lumiko naman pa-KALIWA
English(en): Remember that when turning right on an intersection, make sure to position yourself on the Right lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and turn LEFT.
When turning left, prefer merging on the inner lane to minimize possible crashes (e.g. with other vehicles merging via a left turn). Next, return to the Intersection and perform a U-TURN carefully.
Similar to Right turns, prefer U-turning on the inner lane. Position yourself in the correct lane in advance. Finally, return to the intersection and go straight through it.
For intersections with traffic lights, make sure to follow the signals. Otherwise, drive carefully and observe if there are oncoming vehicles before proceeding.
